pull.title: psbt: Increment input value sum only once per UTXO in decodepsbt
pull.body:
Refactors the UTXO processing of `decodepsbt` to extract the relevant `CTxOut` and handle the input amounts from that. This avoids double counting the input value.

Fixes #19516

events.message: Increment input value sum only once per UTXO in decodepsbt

events.body:
utACK 75122780e2c46505d977e24c5612dfa9442ab754

Marking this for 0.20.1 as well, as #19215 is kind of a regression without it.

issue.title: psbt: Include and allow both non_witness_utxo and witness_utxo for segwit inputs
issue.body:
Due to recent changes to hardware wallets, the full previous transaction will need to be provided for segwit inputs. Since some software may be checking for the existence of a `witness_utxo` to determine whether to produce a segwit signature, we keep that field to ease the transition.

Because all of the sanity checks implemented by the `IsSane` functions were related to having mixed segwit and non-segwit data in a PSBT, those functions are removed as those checks are no longer proper.

Some tests are updated/removed to accommodate this and a simple test added to check that both UTXOs are being added to segwit inputs.

As discussed in the wallet IRC meeting, our own signer will not require `non_witness_utxo` for segwit inputs.

events.body: Would be nice to have a test for this, too.

issue.title: test: add a test for decodepsbt fee behaviour
issue.body:
As requested in #19517. @bitcoinhodler may also have some suggestions given they opened the original issue (#19516), after it was flagged by some of their own tests.

#### Want to work on this issue?

events.body:

Opened a "Good first issue" for this in #19523.

issue.title: [0.20] Backport #19517 - Increment input value sum only once per UTXO in decodepsbt
Bitcoin 0.20.1
issue.body:
Updates the codebase to Bitcoin 0.20.1 which includes the following merges from Bitcoin.

doc: Update 0.20.1 release notes with psbt changes - https://github.com/bitcoin/bitcoin/pull/19636
0.20: Add txids with non-standard inputs to reject filter - https://github.com/bitcoin/bitcoin/pull/19680
[Backport] #19839 and #19842 to v0.20 - https://github.com/bitcoin/bitcoin/pull/20008
[0.20] lint: fix shellcheck URL in CI install - https://github.com/bitcoin/bitcoin/pull/19612
doc: move-only release notes for 0.20.1 - https://github.com/bitcoin/bitcoin/pull/19482
psbt: Increment input value sum only once per UTXO in decodepsbt - https://github.com/bitcoin/bitcoin/pull/19517
[0.20] Fix GBT: Restore "!segwit" and "csv" to "rules" key - https://github.com/bitcoin/bitcoin/pull/19019
[0.20] Add missing QPainterPath include - https://github.com/bitcoin/bitcoin/pull/19170
[0.20] Backports - https://github.com/bitcoin/bitcoin/pull/19224

Also includes a commit to restore 0.20 behaviour that was reverted during the initial 0.20 port for backwards compatibility related to the marker cache, this was included here due to compilation errors with the other changes in this PR. The change moves the call that removes TXs from the marker cache.

Move marker cache removal to be consistent with 0.20 - https://github.com/OmniLayer/omnicore/commit/eb360406c3491f948656a6c9dcf6bf47f56869ee
